meanings.definition: The quality or state of being arrogant or conceited.
meanings.sent1: Her uppishness made it hard for others to approach her.
meanings.sent2: His uppishness was evident in the way he looked down on everyone.
meanings.sent3: Despite her uppishness, she couldn't hide her insecurities.
meanings.sent4: His uppishness was like a shield, protecting him from criticism.
meanings.sent5: The uppishness in her tone made it clear she thought she was better than everyone else.

meanings.definition: Behavior or attitude that is snobbish or haughty.
meanings.sent1: The uppishness of the guests at the party was off-putting.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand his uppishness and decided to avoid him.
meanings.sent3: His uppishness was comical, considering his lack of manners.
meanings.sent4: The uppishness of the cat as it walked by was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent5: The uppishness in her behavior made her seem unapproachable to others.
